title: Sampler, 1822
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and stem stitches on a plain weave foundation; later addition in cross and surface satin stitches
description: Alphabet introduced by Maltese cross. Scattered motifs in the field dominated by religious motifs. Horse-drawn chariot at upper left and animals at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1822.
1822. Medium: silk, linen, and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and stem stitches on a plain weave foundation; later addition in cross and surface satin stitches. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-10.
